1.「ああっ！ 大変だよ！| 大変なことに なっちゃった！: Oh, my God!　Oh, my God! We're in trouble!

2.「王さまが 大軍を率いて 行っちゃったの！| 博士さんも 行っちゃった！: The king has gone with his army! And the|doctor's gone!

3.「うう……。暗黒大樹に 行ったんだよ。| ボク 兵士さんの話を聞いたんだ。: I went to the Dark Tree. I heard the soldier's|story.

4.「暗黒大樹を 破壊しにいくって！: He's going to destroy the Dark Tree!

5.「ボ…ボク イヤだよ。| 博士さんも パパも みんな いい人なのに……: I don't like it. You and Dad are such good|people...

6.「エルフと 大樹の番人が| 戦うなんて おかしいよ。: It's crazy that Elf and the Keeper of the|Trees are fighting.

7.「ね…ねえ ボクを| 暗黒大樹に 連れてって。: Hey...take me to the Dark Tree.

8.「ボク 戦いを止めたいんだ。| お…お願いします。: I want to stop fighting. Please...please.

9.「あ…ありがと！| ボクの頼みを 聞いてくれて！: Thank you! For doing what I asked!

11.「あ…ありがと！| でも ほかの人たちの頼まれごとで| なんだか いっぱいみたい: Thanks! But he seems to be full of other|people's requests...

12.「は…早くしないと 戦いが始まっちゃう！| 用事が済んだら すぐに戻ってきてね！: We've got to hurry, or the fight will start!|Come back as soon as you're done!

13.「そ…そんな。| 早くしないと 戦いが始まっちゃう……。: Oh, no. If we don't hurry, the fight will|start...

14.「でも ほかに頼める人がいないし| ど…どうすればいいんだろ。: But there is no one else I can ask, so...what|should I do?

15.「ニコロイ王は ご不在だ。| すまないが また後で来てくれ。: King Nikoroi is not here. I'm sorry, but|you'll have to come back later.

16.「ボク エルフたちと| 大樹の番人が戦うのを 止めたい。| ボ…ボクを 暗黒大樹: I want to stop the Elves from fighting the|Keeper of the Tree. Take me to the Dark Tree.

17.「あ…暗黒大樹の場所は 覚えてる？| 城を出たら 北へ進んで| カミハルムイ領北: Uh...do you remember where the Dark Tree is?|When you leave the castle, go north to|Kamiharmui Area North.

18.「北西に進んで 落陽の草原に着いたら| 西に まっすぐ進むんだよ。: Go northwest, and when you reach Sunset|Meadow, go straight west.

22.「暗黒大樹の長よ……。聞いてくれ。| 今 暗黒大樹が活性化し| 各地で 魔瘴が:
Tree Chief of the Dark Tree, listen to me. The|Dark Tree has been activated, and demon miasma|is occurring one after another in various|
|places.

23.「このままでは 遠からず| エルトナ大陸は 魔瘴により 滅びるだろう。| 滅びか: At this rate, Eltona Continent will soon be|destroyed by demon miasma. There is only one|way to escape this destruction.

26.「私の後方には 大勢の兵士が控えている。| 号令をかければ 大挙して押し寄せるだ: I have a large number of soldiers behind me.|If I give the order, they will come in droves.

27.「……そうなれば 双方とも| 大きな被害が出ることは まぬがれん。| できれば: If that happens, there will be heavy damage on|both sides. We want to avoid a fight if at all|possible.

31.「大樹の破壊| お前たちの寿命を 縮めるだけ。: The destruction of the great tree will only|shorten your lifespan.

32.「我々の寿命を 縮めるだと……？| いったい どういうことだ？: Shortening our lifespan? What the hell is|going on?

33.「ムリだ。言っても わからない。| お前たち 見たものしか信じない。: I can't do it. Even if I told you, you|wouldn't understand. You only believe what you|see.

34.「……そうか。| 残念だが 交渉の余地は なさそうだな。: I see. I'm afraid that's not negotiable.

35.「許せ！！ 暗黒大樹の番人たちよ！！: Forgive me!　O Dark Tree Guardians!

37.「震動……！？ 地面から！？| ま…まずい！！: Tremors...!　From the ground! Oh no!

38.「王さま 危険です！| 早く この場から離れてください！: My king, it's dangerous! Get out of here,|quickly!

44.「しくじったわ……。逃げおくれた……。: I screwed up... I missed the run...

47.「ねえ！ 博士さんを助けにいこう！: Hey!　Let's go help the doctor!

50.「ましょううおを 倒したか。| お前 勇気ある者だ。: You have defeated Mashououou? You are a brave|man.

51.「ハッパ。強い仲間 持ったな。: Happa. You got a strong companion.

53.「パパ……？| 暗黒大樹の長が 育ての親だったのね……。: Papa...? The Dark Tree Chief was your foster|parent...

55.「暗黒大樹が光り| 魔瘴を 取り込んでいった！？: The Dark Tree shone and took in demon miasma!

58.「ふふっ。まいった……。| これは 想像以上の発見だわ。: Phew. My goodness... this is a find beyond|anything I could have imagined.

59.「この樹は 魔瘴を取り込み 浄化することで| 魔瘴から エルトナ大陸を守ってきた: So this tree has protected Eltona Continent|from demon miasma by taking in and purifying|it.

61.「そうだ。お前 賢い者だ。: That's right. You are a wise man.

62.「エルトナ大陸に発生した 魔瘴。| 聖なる大樹 魔瘴を取り込んでいき| どんどん: The demon miasma occurred in Eltona Continent.|The sacred tree, which has taken in demon|miasma, has become blacker and blacker.

63.「なにも知らない エルフたち。| いつからか 聖なる大樹を| 暗黒大樹と呼ぶよう: Elfs who know nothing. Somewhere along the|line, they started calling the Sacred Tree the|Dark Tree.

64.「だけど長年 魔瘴を取り込んだせいで| この樹の はたらきは 徐々に弱まっていっ:
However, the workings of this tree have|gradually weakened due to the demon miasma it|has taken in over the years. The power to take|
|in demon miasma has gradually decreased...

65.「取り込みきれず あふれた魔瘴が| 今 各地で ふきだしている。| 暗黒大樹の正: Untreated demon miasma is now swirling in the|air in many places. The true nature of the|Dark Tree is...

66.「すなわち 世界樹。そういうことね？: Yggdrasil. That's what it is, isn't it?

68.「な…なんだと！？| この暗黒大樹が 大いなる緑の象徴！？: What...what? This Dark Tree is the symbol of|the Great Green!

69.「はるか昔から 私たちエルフを| 見守り続けてきた 世界樹だというのか……？: Yggdrasil that has been watching over us Elfs|since time immemorial...?

74.「うん……。| ボク 博士さんの所で| いっぱい お手伝いしたから……。: Well, I helped out a lot at your place, so...

77.「賢い者か。| お前に 感謝する。: You are a wise man. Thank you.

78.「……ハッパ。なぜ お前を| ここから 追いだしたのか話す。: ...Happa. I'll tell you why I kicked you out|of here.

80.「大樹 もうすぐ 限界。| 魔瘴を 取り込めなくなる。: The tree is almost at its limit. We can't take|in demon miasma anymore.

81.「ここ 濃い魔瘴だらけになったら| エルフの お前 生きていけなくなる。| だか: If this place is full of thick demon miasma,|you, an Elf, won't be able to survive. That's|why I sent you away.

83.「これも 自然の意志。: This is also the will of nature.

86.「王さま。ひとまず 城に戻りましょう。: Dear King. Let's go back to the castle for|now.

90.「暗黒大樹と呼ばれてた樹が 世界樹だった……。| はるか昔から 魔瘴を取り込み:
The Dark Tree, as it was called, was the|Yggdrasil... and it's been taking in demon|miasmas and purifying them for ages, and now|
|it's reaching its limits. I don't know...

92.「……あたしの研究は ムダだったってわけね。| 魔瘴の増加は おさえられないし|: So my research was all for nothing. I wonder|if we're finished now that the demon miasma|can't be controlled...

95.「あ…あのね。| 暗黒大樹の芯を覆う 魔瘴って| どうにか できないかな？: Uh...you know. Can't you do something about|the demon miasma that covers the core of the|Dark Tree?

97.「大樹の芯から 魔瘴がなくなれば| 魔瘴を取り込むチカラが 回復するんでしょ？: If the core of the tree is free of demon|miasma, it will regain its ability to take in|demon miasma, right?

98.「そしたら 各地に現れた魔瘴も| また 暗黒大樹が取り込んで 浄化するように|: Then the demon miasma that appears in various|places might also be taken in and purified by|the Dark Tree... Is there any way to do that?

99.「多くの研究者が 今も| 魔瘴を 消滅させる方法を調べてるけど| まだ 誰にも突: Many researchers are still trying to figure|out how to eliminate the demon miasma, but no|one has been able to do it yet...

100.「もう 時間も残されてないし| 今から調べても 間に合わないわ……。: We don't have much time left, and if we start|looking now, we'll never get there in time...

101.「そうなの？| でも 博士さんなら きっと できるよ。: Is that so? But I'm sure you can do it.

103.「そうだよ！| だって 博士さんは天才だもん！: That's right! Because you are a genius!

105.「へへ！ そうよね！| まだ 終わったわけじゃないわ！: Hehe!　I know, right? ! It's not over yet!

106.「魔瘴を消滅させる方法さえ 突き止めれば| いいんだし こんなの楽勝だわ！: If only we could figure out how to make the|demon miasma disappear, this would be a piece|of cake!

107.「よーし！ いちから出直しよ！| 魔瘴を消滅させる方法は あたしが| なんとして: All right!　Let's start from scratch! I'll find|a way to eliminate the demon miasma, no matter|what it takes!

109.「ハラが減っては いくさは できぬってね！| なんか 栄養のあるもの買ってきて！: You can't do well if you're hungry! Get me|something nourishing!

111.「えへへ！ 暗黒大樹に| 連れてってくれて ありがとね！| これ！ ボクからの: Hehehe!　Thanks for taking me to Dark Tree!|Here!　It's my way of saying thank you!

112.「えへへ！| ボク 買い物 行ってくるね！: Heh heh heh! I'm going shopping!
